Item.name: Emergency Jetpack
Item.description: A makeshift jetpack which can dump its fuel in a short period of time, launching the user in one direction very quickly. Works underwater. Use with caution, as it explodes when fully used.

Item.aliases: ekutility_heavytank_weldingfuel,heavy fuel tank,heavy welding fuel tank
heavy incendium tank,heavy incendium fuel tank
